Plot: Hoping to alter the events of the past, a 19th century inventor instead travels 800,000 years into the future, where he finds humankind divided into two warring races.
Title: The Time Machine
Writer: H.G. Wells (novel), David Duncan (earlier screenplay), John Logan (screenplay)
Actors: Guy Pearce, Mark Addy, Phyllida Law, Sienna Guillory
tomatoConsensus: This Machine has all the razzle-dazzles of modern special effects, but the movie takes a turn for the worst when it switches from a story about lost love to a confusing action-thriller.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 2 nominations.
